summary: Sword&Dagger, Axe, and Mace perks are split up. 1-handed weapons are faster and lower dmg with speed boosts and high critical. 2-handed weapons have vicious effects with nasty power attacks. Staves add magic damage. And
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[color=f08020][size=3][b]This mod will continue in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10037]ACE - Comprehensive Enhancements[/url]
I won\'t update this page anymore, but I\'ll leave it for people who like it in it\'s current state.
The master mod linked above will off modular file support, 
so you can still find updates to this mod there.[/b][/size][/color]

[color=008080][size=3][b]Athyra\'s Comprehensive Enhancements - ACE - Melee[/b][/size][/color]

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-1-1333169000.jpg[/img]

[color=008000][size=4][b]What this Mod does[/b][/size][/color]
[color=008080][size=3][b] One-Handed[/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-3-1334266946.jpg](click here to see a description of the perk tree)[/url]
There are 3 main styles with One-Handed: [url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-5-1334266947.jpg]Duelist, Shield[/url], and Dual Wield
The Staff Style - When holding a staff, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-1-1334422212.jpg]all magic is 10% stronger[/url]. (Time for mages to be mages!)
The Duelist Style - When the off-hand is empty, get +20% speed, +5% critical, +5% parry.
The Shield Style - When holding a shield, get a 5% chance to reflect damage back.
The Dual Wield Style - Largely the same as vanilla, but speed bonuses stack with other perks.
All one-handed weapons get 1/2 power attack damage & stamina use 

* [url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-1-1334266879.jpg]Fighting Stance[/url] lvl1 - 25% less stamina used for power attacks, and +10% damage.
* Fighting Stance lvl2 - 50% less stamina used for power attacks
* Dagger & Sword Training - Daggers & Swords +20% damage. Take -15% damage and -50% criticals from them.
* War Axe Training - War Axes +20% damage. Take -15% damage and -50% criticals from them.
* Light Mace Training - One-handed Maces +20% damage. Take -15% damage and -50% criticals from them.
* Bonebreaker - tops out at 50% armor ignored, but only uses 2 perks
* [url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-1-1334266945.jpg]Bladesman[/url] - increases sword and dagger attack speed, lvl 1 is +10% and lvl2 is +20%
* [url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-5-1334266816.jpg]Opportunist[/url] - increases all 1-handed critical hit chances by 7%
* Savage Strike - +50% critical hit chance with standing power attacks
* [url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-3-1334266881.jpg]Dual Savagery[/url] - +33% critical hit chance with dual wielding power attacks
* [url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-4-1334266881.jpg]Master Bladesman[/url] - 15% chance to attack incredibly fast
* Expert Bone Breaker - 15% chance to attack incredibly fast
* Hack & Slash Virtuoso - 15% chance to attack incredibly fast
(note: these fast attacks are at lvl 90 and replace the 3rd level of the specialized perks)

You can check your Active Effects menu to confirm you are getting the benefits of Duelist or Shield style.
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-5-1334266947.jpg]Here\'s a picture of what they look like in there.[/url]

[color=008080][size=3][b] Two-Handed[/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-4-1334266947.jpg](click here to see a description of the perk tree)[/url]
All Two-Handed weapons get +20% power attack damage, and +20% stagger.
Sneaking with a two-handed weapon is 40% more difficult.

* [url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-3-1334266734.jpg]Champion\'s Stance[/url] lvl1 - 25% less stamina used for power attacks, +20% damage with 2-handers 
* Champion\'s Stance lvl2 - 50% less stamina used for power attacks
* Greatsword Training - Greatswords do +30% damage. Take -15% damage and -50% criticals from them.
* Battle Axe Training - Battle axes +30% damage. Take -15% damage and -50% criticals from them.
* Warhammer Training - Warhammers do +30% damage. Take -15% damage and -50% criticals from them.
* [url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-5-1334266735.jpg]Internal Bleeding[/url] - Warhammers get a 30% chance to cause a small bleed but for 5 minutes
* Skull Crusher - now only 2 levels and caps at 85% armor ignored
* [url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-2-1334266733.jpg]Crippling Blow[/url] - Greatswords get a 15% chance to immobilize for 2secs.
* Limb Splitter - last lvl bleed effect is 3x longer and 3x stronger
* [url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-3-1334266814.jpg]Gusher[/url] - Battle Axes get a 15% chance to cause a gushing wound dealing enormous damage for a few moments.
* Supplanter - Power attacks with two-handed weapons do +50% damage.
(note: Internal Bleeding, Crippling Blow, and Gusher are lvl 40)

[i] - NOTE:  \"50% less criticals\" means: original enemy critical chance is 10%, with perk it is 5%[/i]


[color=008000][size=4][b]The Goal of this Mod[/b][/size][/color]
 - balance and diversify the use of weapon perks in the game.
 - create more distinct playing styles and variety
 - make fights more involved.
 - tempt players to cross-discipline a little more. 
 - dual-wielding should be vicious, as deadly as 2-handed weapons
 - one-handed otherwise is more tactical
 - two-handed should be brutal, made for pure death-by-metal, think barbarian or raging orc

 - There are 12 distinct playing styles:
2H, 1H (no off-hand), 1H (+shield or magic), Duel Wielding
 * times *
Axes, Maces, Swords & Daggers

This should really allow players to find their style\'s perfect match.

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13502-5-1334266881.jpg[/img]
[/center]
